purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 醒
Pictophonetic: 垂 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
睡觉 [ shuì jiào ]: to go to bed; to sleep
睡眠 [ shuì mián ]: sleep; to sleep; (computing) to enter sleep mode
入睡 [ rù shuì ]: to fall asleep
沉睡 [ chén shuì ]: to be fast asleep; (fig.) to lie dormant; to lie undiscovered
瞌睡 [ kē shuì ]: drowsy; to doze; to nap
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 垂 [ chuí ] to hang, to dangle; to hand down, to bequeath; almost, near
heisig_chinese_memo: Our eyes droop when we want to sleep.
heisig_constituent: drowsy, eye, droop, drop, silage, walking cane, stick, one, floor
koohiiStory1: Our eyes droop when we are drowsy.
koohiiStory2: Hint : the eyes of Droopy Dog (see droop (#1582)). When you are drowsy you have "droopy eyes". That is, you have Droopy´s eyes!
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your eyes start to close as you drive your car because you’re getting drowsy. This is a very dangerous way to drive your car, especially since your car is missing its top and its bottom. This is no time to be getting drowsy. Keep your eyes open and drive for your life!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel yourself getting drowsy as you drive this goofy car. You’re so tired. Struggle to keep your eyes open. Also visualize this car missing its top and its bottom because the car radical is modified.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The reason you’re so drowsy, and also the reason your car is missing part of its bottom, is because you took one of the car’s tires and made a tire swing (すい) out of it. You’d been swinging on the tire swing all day and now you’re super drowsy and worn out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself swinging on this tire swing. You’ve been swinging for a while and you’re getting really drowsy.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 垂 (たれる、スイ свисать). Не путать: 唾 (つば、ダ、タ слюна).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your eye (目) hangs down (垂) when you're drowsy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Our eyes droop when we want to sleep.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " eye ", " down " sound, the original meaning is sitting and taking a nap. "Shuowen": "Sit sleepily. From the eyes, down." Classics use the original meaning, such as "Warring States Policy‧Qin Ceyi": "Reading to sleep, the head pierces itself, and the blood flows to the feet." ‧Biography of King Shang: "When Duke Xiao sees Wei Marting, he talks for a long time. When Duke Xiao goes to sleep, he listens." Tang poems also use the original meaning, such as Bai Juyi's "Thirteen of the East Neighbors": "To drive sorrows, know the power of wine, break sleep See tea work."

" Sleep " can be extended to sleep. "Guangyun‧ Zhiyun": "Sleep, sleep, sleep." "Words‧Membu": "Sleep, this is the general term for sleep." "Zhuangzi‧ Lieyukou": "The pearl of husband's daughter must be in the ninefold abyss Lilong nodded. Those who can get pearls will sleep." Han Yu's poem "Su Shengui Zhao Li 28 Feng Shiqi" in Tang Dynasty: "I stayed at the post pavilion and did not sleep at night. Zhengyi." Song Su Shi's poem "Begonia": "I only fear that the flowers will fall asleep late at night, so I burn a high candle and put on red makeup."

" Sleep " can also mean lying down. For example, "Water Margin" Chapter 43: "I don't realize that I am also top-heavy, fainted, do a pile of softness, and sleep underground." "The Scholars" Chapter 12: "Those friends gamble with me, call me Sleeping in the heart of the street, stretched out his arms, waited for the car to come, and couldn't get up to let him."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " eye ", " down " sound, the original meaning is sitting and taking a nap.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「垂」聲，本義為坐著打盹。《說文》：「坐寐也。从目、垂。」典籍用本義，如《戰國策‧秦策一》：「讀書欲睡，引錐自刺其股，血流至足。」《史記‧商君列傳》：「孝公既見衛鞅，語事良久，孝公時時睡，弗聽。」唐詩也用本義，如白居易〈贈東鄰王十三〉：「驅愁知酒力，破睡見茶功。」

　　「睡」可引申為睡覺。《廣韻‧寘韻》：「睡，眠睡。」《字彙‧目部》：「睡，今睡眠通稱。」《莊子‧列禦寇》：「夫千金之珠，必在九重之淵而驪龍頷下。子能得珠者，必遭其睡也。」唐代韓愈詩〈宿神龜招李二十八馮十七〉：「夜宿驛亭愁不睡，幸來相就蓋征衣。」宋蘇軾詩〈海棠〉：「只恐夜深花睡去，故燒高燭照紅妝。」

　　「睡」還可表示躺下。如《水滸傳》第43回：「不覺自家也頭重腳輕，暈倒了，軟做一堆，睡在地下。」《儒林外史》第12回：「那些朋友們和我賭賽，叫我睡在街心裏，把膀子伸着，等那車來，有心不起來讓他。」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「垂」聲，本義為坐著打盹。

睡眠(すいみん): sleep

從「 目 」，「 垂 」聲，本義為坐著打盹。《說文》：「坐寐也。从目、垂。」典籍用本義，如《戰國策‧秦策一》：「讀書欲睡，引錐自刺其股，血流至足。」《史記‧商君列傳》：「孝公既見衛鞅，語事良久，孝公時時睡，弗聽。」唐詩也用本義，如白居易〈贈東鄰王十三〉：「驅愁知酒力，破睡見茶功。」 「 睡 」可引申為睡覺。《廣韻‧寘韻》：「睡，眠睡。」《字彙‧目部》：「睡，今睡眠通稱。」《莊子‧列禦寇》：「夫千金之珠，必在九重之淵而驪龍頷下。子能得珠者，必遭其睡也。」唐代韓愈詩〈宿神龜招李二十八馮十七〉：「夜宿驛亭愁不睡，幸來相就蓋征衣。」宋蘇軾詩〈海棠〉：「只恐夜深花睡去，故燒高燭照紅妝。」 「 睡 」還可表示躺下。如《水滸傳》第43回：「不覺自家也頭重腳輕，暈倒了，軟做一堆，睡在地下。」《儒林外史》第12回：「那些朋友們和我賭賽，叫我睡在街心裏，把膀子伸着，等那車來，有心不起來讓他。」
From the " eye", " down" sound, the original meaning is sitting and taking a nap. "Shuowen": "Sit sleepily. From the eyes, down." Classics use the original meaning, such as "Warring States Policy‧Qin Ceyi": "Reading to sleep, the head pierces itself, and the blood flows to the feet." ‧Biography of King Shang: "When Duke Xiao sees Wei Marting, he talks for a long time. When Duke Xiao goes to sleep, he listens." Tang poems also use the original meaning, such as Bai Juyi's "Thirteen of the East Neighbors": "To drive sorrows, know the power of wine, break sleep See tea work." " Sleep" can be extended to sleep. "Guangyun‧ Zhiyun": "Sleep, sleep, sleep." "Words‧Membu": "Sleep, this is the general term for sleep." "Zhuangzi‧ Lieyukou": "The pearl of husband's daughter must be in the ninefold abyss Lilong nodded. Those who can get pearls will sleep." Han Yu's poem "Su Shengui Zhao Li 28 Feng Shiqi" in Tang Dynasty: "I stayed at the post pavilion and did not sleep at night. Zhengyi." Song Su Shi's poem "Begonia": "I only fear that the flowers will fall asleep late at night, so I burn a high candle and put on red makeup." " Sleep" can also mean lying down. For example, "Water Margin" Chapter 43: "I don't realize that I am also top-heavy, fainted, do a pile of softness, and sleep underground." "The Scholars" Chapter 12: "Those friends gamble with me, call me Sleeping in the heart of the street, stretched out his arms, waited for the car to come, and couldn't get up to let him."

睡字的基本解释

睡
shuì
闭目安息，大脑皮质处于休息状态：睡意。睡觉。睡梦。睡眠。入睡。睡魔（喻强烈的睡意）。
couchdosspound one's earrestsleep

睡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuì］
［《廣韻》是僞切，去寘，禪。］
(1)睡觉。
(2)打盹；瞌睡。
(3)躺；躺下。

睡字的英文翻译

◎ 睡
couch, doss, pound one's ear, rest, sleep

睡字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　睡； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页810第23
【唐韻】是僞切【集韻】【韻會】樹僞切【正韻】殊僞切，?音瑞。【說文】坐寐也。【史記·商君傳】衞鞅語事良久，孝公時時睡，弗聽。【前漢·賈誼治安策】將吏被介冑而睡。　又花名。【淸異錄】盧山一比丘晝寢石上，夢中聞花香，旣覺，尋香求之，因名睡香。四方奇之，謂乃花中祥瑞，遂以瑞易睡。　又草名。【洞冥記】末多國有五味草，食之使人不眠，名曰却睡草。【述異記】桂林有睡草，見之則令人睡。亦呼爲懶婦箴。　【說文】本作?，从目?聲。【六書故】睡卽古寐字。

睡字的源字形

睡字的起名意思

坐着打瞌睡，后指睡着，睡觉。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Lunch Concentration】【Headword Department】　睡; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 810 23
[Tang Yun] is a pseudo-cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] tree pseudo-cut [zhengyun] special pseudo-cut,? Yinrui. 【Said Wen】Sit sleepy. [Historical Records·Shang Jun Biography] Wei Yang talked about things for a long time, and filial piety fell asleep from time to time, but listened. [Previous Han Jia Yi Public Security Policy] The generals were put to sleep by the police.　Also known as the flower name. [Chang Yilu] Lushan a monk sleeps on the stone during the day, smells the fragrance of flowers in dreams, feels asleep, seeks for incense, and sleeps because of the name. The Quartet is strange, saying that it is auspicious in the flower, so Yi Rui is easy to sleep.　Also cursive name. [Dong Ming Ji] At the end of the world, there are five-flavored grasses, eating them makes people sleepless, but the name is sleeping grass. 【Summary】There are sleeping grasses in Guilin, but seeing it makes people sleepy. Also called the slut proverb.　【Said the text】This work is from the eye to the sound. [Six Books and Gu] The ancient slumber word for sleeping.
sleep

sleep
Name meaning
Sitting and dozing off, the back refers to falling asleep and sleeping.
形声字。目表意,其形像眼睛,表示闭目而睡;垂(chuf )表声,垂有向下、低下之义,表示坐着打瞌睡时眼脸下垂。本义
是坐着打瞌睡。后指睡觉。

Radicals: 目, 車  (eye, car)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your eyes start to close as you drive your car because you’re getting drowsy. This is a very dangerous way to drive your car, especially since your car is missing its top and its bottom. This is no time to be getting drowsy. Keep your eyes open and drive for your life!
Feel yourself getting drowsy as you drive this goofy car. You’re so tired. Struggle to keep your eyes open. Also visualize this car missing its top and its bottom because the car radical is modified.
Reading Mnemonic
The reason you’re so drowsy, and also the reason your car is missing part of its bottom, is because you took one of the car’s tires and made a tire swing (すい) out of it. You’d been swinging on the tire swing all day and now you’re super drowsy and worn out.
Imagine yourself swinging on this tire swing. You’ve been swinging for a while and you’re getting really drowsy.
